banner.text: Let's turbo charge our pixel using random numbers.

Random numbers are different each time the code runs.
Open the Math tray
Drag the block into your code space...
... and connect it to this block.

Change this from 10 to 16,
because your lightboard is 16 pixels wide.

Look! The lights are slowly filling up the width of the lightboard.
Now let's speed things up.
Change seconds to frames so the loop runs faster
You made a glittering line of lights!
Now let's play with the colors! Ready?
